presetPlanItem.description: 1. Review the knowledge representation features required for metabolomics data min- ing, which were identified in chapter chap:Requirements(see section 4.5)

customisedPlanItem.description: 1. Review the knowledge representation features required for metabolomics data min- ing, which were identified in chapter chap:Requirements(see section 4.5)

objectivesList.presetDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.

presetPlanItem.description: 2. Identify the requirements and preferences of the domain expert regarding the knowl- edge representation.

customisedPlanItem.description: 2. Identify the requirements and preferences of the domain expert regarding the knowl- edge representation.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 2. The presented Knowledge must be interpretable and comprehendible by the domain expert.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 2. The presented Knowledge must be interpretable and comprehendible by the domain expert.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 3. Knowledge presentation must support human interaction, e.g. the adjustment of the model inputs and parameters, and evaluating it impacts on the outcomes of the model.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 3. Knowledge presentation must support human interaction, e.g. the adjustment of the model inputs and parameters, and evaluating it impacts on the outcomes of the model.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 5. Knowledge presentation should be performed according to metabolomics domain expert perspective, as the domain expert is the principle knowledge presentation stake holder.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 5. Knowledge presentation should be performed according to metabolomics domain expert perspective, as the domain expert is the principle knowledge presentation stake holder.

presetPlanItem.description: 3. Match the defined knowledge representation features and facilities in step 1 and the identified domain expert requirements in step 2 to the available data mining model representation techniques and tools (see section 6.2.8).

customisedPlanItem.description: 3. Match the defined knowledge representation features and facilities in step 1 and the identified domain expert requirements in step 2 to the available data mining model representation techniques and tools (see section 6.2.8).

objectivesList.presetDescription: 5. Knowledge presentation should be performed according to metabolomics domain expert perspective, as the domain expert is the principle knowledge presentation stake holder.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 5. Knowledge presentation should be performed according to metabolomics domain expert perspective, as the domain expert is the principle knowledge presentation stake holder.

presetPlanItem.description: 4. Assess the requirements of the decided representation technique, including: software tools, hardware and expertise as well as inputs, parameters, and expected outputs, and application constraints, including: time, cost, and expertise as well as the availability of the software and hardware infrastructure.

customisedPlanItem.description: 4. Assess the requirements of the decided representation technique, including: software tools, hardware and expertise as well as inputs, parameters, and expected outputs, and application constraints, including: time, cost, and expertise as well as the availability of the software and hardware infrastructure.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 1. Presenting the discovered knowledge according to the requirements and preferences of the domain expert.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 2. The presented Knowledge must be interpretable and comprehendible by the domain expert.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 2. The presented Knowledge must be interpretable and comprehendible by the domain expert.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 3. Knowledge presentation must support human interaction, e.g. the adjustment of the model inputs and parameters, and evaluating it impacts on the outcomes of the model.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 3. Knowledge presentation must support human interaction, e.g. the adjustment of the model inputs and parameters, and evaluating it impacts on the outcomes of the model.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 4. Knowledge presentation must support traceability of model inputs, parameters, justifications, decisions and outcomes.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 4. Knowledge presentation must support traceability of model inputs, parameters, justifications, decisions and outcomes.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 5. Knowledge presentation should be performed according to metabolomics domain expert perspective, as the domain expert is the principle knowledge presentation stake holder.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 5. Knowledge presentation should be performed according to metabolomics domain expert perspective, as the domain expert is the principle knowledge presentation stake holder.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 7. Knowledge presentation must encourage visualisation where possible.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 7. Knowledge presentation must encourage visualisation where possible.

objectivesList.presetDescription: 6. Knowledge presentation must allow multiple presentation of the same model that reflects the knowledge from different perspectives.
objectivesList.customisedDescription: 6. Knowledge presentation must allow multiple presentation of the same model that reflects the knowledge from different perspectives.

presetPlanItem.description: 5. Prototype the data mining model representation iteratively through the steps 3-4 until the desired features are satisfied, the requirements of the domain expert are met, and the phase objectives are achieved.

customisedPlanItem.description: 5. Prototype the data mining model representation iteratively through the steps 3-4 until the desired features are satisfied, the requirements of the domain expert are met, and the phase objectives are achieved.

presetPlanItem.description: 5. Evaluate the data mining model representation (to be carried out by domain expert) interpretability as a metabolomics knowledge.

customisedPlanItem.description: 6. Evaluate the data mining model representation (to be carried out by domain expert) interpretability as a metabolomics knowledge.
